questions.question: A conscious relationship is characterized by:
According to the course, your relationship patterns are primarily shaped by:
options: Early attachment experiences and family dynamics

questions.question: The most important aspect of communication in relationships is:
options: Speaking and listening with presence and care

questions.question: Healthy conflict in relationships:
options: Can deepen understanding and connection when handled well

questions.question: Sustaining love over time requires:
options: Ongoing intention, growth, and conscious effort
